payload.text: Call and schedule a Virtual Reality tour at our office. We try our best to give our current tenants 24 hours notice for viewings, so be proactive and call ahead of the day you plan to make an appointment!
You can always cancel a viewing! Just call in as much advance as you can, please and thanks!

wait_outside.text: Please wait outside the home for the leasing agent to show you around. Don't knock on the front door, even if you're early. Remember that we want to be respectful of the current tenants.

consider_renting.text: Personally, I would think of the following considerations... 1) How many people you want to share a living space with 2) Who you want to be your housemates 3) what your budget is 4) How far you're willing to live away from campus 5) How close the nearest bus stop is and what routes service that area

groups_individual.text: Apartments are rented to both single and group applicants. Our houses are only open to groups.

secure_listing.text: You will need to place a non-refundable deposit of last month's rent to secure the room. The deposit secures the room/suite/house for 5 days, at which time all lease documents need to be completed, key deposit and rent payments arranged in order to complete the rental agreement.

deposit_refundable.text: The last month's rent deposit is not refundable. Let me know if you want to learn about key deposits

key_deposit.text: A $200 refundable key deposit must be paid within FIVE days of the initial deposit. It can be paid by debit, credit (w/ 4% service fee), or post-dated cheque. You can post-date the cheque to be cashed on the 1st day of your lease.

lease_length.text: We offer three-year leases with the option to terminate after one-year, or to renew for up to 3 years at the same rental price.

payload.text: There is a sample copy of our lease located on our website. You will be able to print out a personalized lease, only after you (and your entire group) have made a deposit and started the online lease process.

lease_online.text: When you make a deposit on a rental, we send a link to your email to kick-start the lease process. Once you have the email, click on the link and follow the step-by-step instructions

payload.text:
For initial deposits: debit, certified cheque, or credit card*. These payments must be made ON SITE in our office.  We also accept walk-in debit/credit* payments. 

 Alternatively, you can download a form here!

advance_method_of_payment.text: Ease for all parties, and for you to avoid incurring the utility fee is the short answer. Your method of payment is required as part of your lease package which is due within five days of making a deposit

guarantor_form.text: Having a guarantor for your lease is very similar to getting a co-signer for a mortgage. It ensures the landlord will get paid if a tenant does not pay the rent. In the majority of cases, a student's parents act as the guarantor and will be called. Nobody wants that to happen!

house_clean.text: your place will be cleaned before you move in but further cleaning by you and/or your group may be required to achieve personal standards. We do not re-send cleaning crews.

renters_insurance.text: In the waiver you sign as part of the leasing package, it states that tenants belongings should be insured, either by renter's insurance or extended coverage under his or her parent/guardian's home insurance.

pet_friendly.text: Sorry, Domus houses and apartments don't accept pets :'(
